items.descrText: Can be used at the Horticrafting bench in your hideout.
Can be used at the Horticrafting bench in your hideout.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Exalted Orb.

explicitMods: Reforges the colour of sockets on an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it.

explicitMods: Adds Redeemer influence and a new Redeemer modifier to a rare item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a high-level rare item with no influence to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Engineer's Orb.

explicitMods: Adds Hunter influence and a new Hunter modifier to a rare item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a high-level rare item with no influence to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.

explicitMods: Randomises the quality of a corrupted armour
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a corrupted armour to apply it. The maximum random quality is 29%.

explicitMods: Adds a Grand Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet. This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers.
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.

explicitMods: Adds a Lesser Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet. This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers.
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.

explicitMods: Augments a rare item with a new random modifier
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.
A stack of 5 fragments becomes a Scroll of Wisdom.

explicitMods: Corrupts an item, modifying it unpredictably
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click an item to corrupt it. Corrupted items cannot be modified again.
A stack of 20 shards becomes a Chaos Orb.

explicitMods: Unpredictably reforges the colour of sockets on a corrupted item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a corrupted socketed item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Transmutation.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy.

explicitMods: Removes a random modifier from an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click on a magic or rare item to apply it.

explicitMods: If The Searing Exarch is dominant, remove a prefix modifier. If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, remove a suffix modifier.
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click on a magic or rare item with The Searing Exarch or The Eater of Worlds dominance to apply it.

explicitMods: Grants an atlas passive skill refund point
items.descrText: Right click on this item to use it.

explicitMods: Adds an Exceptional Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet. This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers.
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Horizons.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alteration.

explicitMods: Adds or rerolls a modifier on a Voidstone.
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a Voidstone to apply it.

explicitMods: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers, including a Veiled modifier. Can only be used on items that can have a Veiled modifier.
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it.

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it.

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a map to apply it.

explicitMods: Identifies an item

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a corrupted socketed item to apply it.

12% increased Attack Speed
2% increased Area of Effect per 25 Rampage Kills

Rampage
